security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://*.supabase.co wss://*.supabase.co

bundle.shortDescription: A modern note-taking app with offline support
bundle.longDescription: FlexNotes is a modern, cross-platform note-taking app with offline support and real-time sync. Features include markdown editing, checklists, tags, folders, and shareable notes.
